import { PhotoIcon, UserCircleIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/solid"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { selectBrands } from "../../product-list/productSlice"; import { selectCategories } from "../../product-list/productSlice"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; function ProductForm() { const brands = useSelector(selectBrands); const categories = useSelector(selectCategories); const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
{ dispatch( checkUserAsync({ email: data.email, password: data.password, }) ); })} >
